mapper.sql: SELECT MOVIE_NO, MEMBER_NO, MOVIE_TITLE, MOVIE_GENRE, MOVIE_RELEASE, MOVIE_DIRECTOR, MOVIE_CAST, MOVIE_RATING, MOVIE_TRAILER, MOVIE_POSTER, RENAMED_POSTER, MOVIE_STATUS, IMG, RENAMED_IMG, MOVIE_SUMMARY, PRICE, READCOUNT, MOVIE_COMMENT, MOVIE_GRADE, CREATE_DATE FROM MOVIE_INFO
mapper.select: WHERE SYSDATE >= MOVIE_RELEASE AND MOVIE_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY MOVIE_NO DESC
WHERE MOVIE_RELEASE > SYSDATE AND MOVIE_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY MOVIE_NO DESC
WHERE MOVIE_GENRE LIKE #{genre} AND MOVIE_STATUS ='Y' ORDER BY MOVIE_RELEASE DESC

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY TICKETS DESC) RANKS, B.MOVIE_NO, B.MEMBER_NO, B.MOVIE_TITLE, B.MOVIE_GENRE, B.MOVIE_RELEASE, B.MOVIE_DIRECTOR, B.MOVIE_CAST, B.MOVIE_RATING, B.MOVIE_TRAILER, B.MOVIE_POSTER, B.RENAMED_POSTER, B.MOVIE_STATUS, B.IMG, B.RENAMED_IMG, B.MOVIE_SUMMARY, B.PRICE, B.READCOUNT, B.MOVIE_COMMENT, B.MOVIE_GRADE, B.CREATE_DATE FROM MOVIE_INFO B INNER JOIN (SELECT MOVIE_TITLE, COUNT(MOVIE_TITLE) AS TICKETS FROM TICKETING GROUP BY MOVIE_TITLE) A on (B.MOVIE_TITLE= A.MOVIE_TITLE) WHERE ROWNUM < 5 AND B.MOVIE_STATUS= 'Y' AND SYSDATE >= B.MOVIE_RELEASE

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY MOVIE_NO) RANKS, MOVIE_NO, MEMBER_NO, MOVIE_TITLE, MOVIE_GENRE, MOVIE_RELEASE, MOVIE_DIRECTOR, MOVIE_CAST, MOVIE_RATING, MOVIE_TRAILER, MOVIE_POSTER, RENAMED_POSTER, MOVIE_STATUS, IMG, RENAMED_IMG, MOVIE_SUMMARY, PRICE, READCOUNT, MOVIE_COMMENT, MOVIE_GRADE, CREATE_DATE FROM MOVIE_INFO WHERE ROWNUM < 5 AND MOVIE_STATUS= 'Y' AND SYSDATE < MOVIE_RELEASE
